meanings.definition: A person who is involved in politics or political activities.
meanings.sent1: The politickers gathered at the town hall to discuss the upcoming election.
meanings.sent2: Politickers often attend rallies and debates to support their candidates.
meanings.sent3: Why did the politickers bring balloons to the political convention? To add some fun!
meanings.sent4: The politickers in the city council race were like chess players, strategizing every move.
meanings.sent5: The image of the politickers shaking hands with constituents was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: To engage in political activities or maneuvering.
meanings.sent1: She politickers with local officials to advocate for better schools in the district.
meanings.sent2: Politickers often strategize behind the scenes to gain support for their policies.
meanings.sent3: The cat politickers its way through the crowded room, trying to reach its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The river politickers around the rocks, finding its way through the narrow canyon.
meanings.sent5: The wind politickers through the trees, rustling the leaves in a gentle dance.
